attributes.action: Fly all Union Jacks on or outside government buildings at half mast  on the days our soldiers are repatriated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: prime minister to ensure all government buildings including local council buildings fly their union jacks at half mast on the days our soldiers are brought back home for repatriation, as a mark of respect to the soldiers and the families for the sacrifice they have made to the continued safety and freedom of this country and it's citizens
